a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of men vs women with developmental intellectual disabilities,
The estimated share of the population with a developmental intellectual disability, by sex. This can include delayed or
impaired speech, language, motor condition, visual and spatial skills.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
